Fast Input Set the battery ratio to stop charging Battery charging limit Battery discharging limit Set the battery ratio to stop discharging Slow charge YBOOST Are you sure you want to open YBOOST? The YBOOST function supports most electrical appliances, but please note the following during use: \n1. Please only connect one device to avoid voltage changes affecting the normal use of other appliances when multiple appliances are in use; \n2. YBOOST is more suitable for appliances such as blowers, kitchen appliances, and tools; \n3. Electrical appliances with strict voltage requirements should be fully tested before use; \n4.Do not connect to the home power grid under YBOOST status, otherwise low-voltage protection will be triggered and trip. boost effect file check failure Your old and new password are the same save Setting failed Successfully bound the device.
